Submodules¶

ddf_utils.ddf_reader module¶

ddf_utils.ddf_reader.ddf_concepts(ddf_id)¶

return all concepts

ddf_utils.ddf_reader.ddf_datapoint(ddf_id, concept, key=None)¶

return one datapoint

ddf_utils.ddf_reader.ddf_datapoints(ddf_id)¶

return all datapoints

in case of there are multiple files for one concept (with different keys) this function will return a dictionary in the form of {(concept, keys): dataframe}

ddf_utils.ddf_reader.ddf_entities(ddf_id)¶

return all entities

ddf_utils.ddf_reader.ddf_index_cols(ddf_id, concept)¶

return the index columns for given concept

create ddf–index.csv

ddf_utils.index.create_index_file(path, indexfile='ddf--index.csv')¶
ddf_utils.index.datapoint_index(path, datapoint_file)¶
ddf_utils.index.entity_index(path, entity_file)¶

ddf_utils.io module¶

io functions for ddf files

ddf_utils.io.load_google_xls(filehash)¶
ddf_utils.io.to_csv(df, out_dir, ftype, concept, by=None, **kwargs)¶

save a ddf dataframe to csv file. the file path of csv will be out_dir/ddf–$ftype–$concept–$by.csv

ddf_utils.metadata module¶

ddf_utils.metadata.generate_metadata(ddf_path, outpath)¶
ddf_utils.metadata.to_dict_dropna(data)¶

return a dictionary that do not contain any NaN values from a dataframe.

ddf_utils.str module¶

string functions for ddf files

ddf_utils.str.fix_time_range(s)¶

change a time range to the middle of year in the range. e.g. fix_time_range(‘1980-90’) = 1985

ddf_utils.str.format_float_digits(number, digits=5, threshold=None)¶
ddf_utils.str.format_float_sigfig(number, sigfig=5, threshold=None)¶
ddf_utils.str.to_concept_id(s, sep='_') → str¶

convert a string to alphanumeric format.
